rulesStrings.li: quality_line->Some high tones sound a bit scratchy.
quality_line->High vocal tones came out falsetto.
quality_line->Questionable choice of instruments for this particular genre.
quality_line->It's subtle, but you can hear someone starting a motor vehicle in the background.
quality_line->The recording unknowingly picked up a faint radio station.
production_quality->Minor sound glitches make themselves known every so often, a sign of faulty recording.
production_quality->The sound skips every so often.
production_quality->Whoever balanced the bass made it too deep.
production_quality->A poor-quality mic unintentionally made everything sound like it was recorded in a tin can.
production_quality->The volume suddenly rose during a segment.
production_quality->The song gets truncated suddenly near the end.
